thread.title: Sydney Islamic school loses govt funding
thread.title_full: Sydney Islamic school loses govt funding

title: Sydney Islamic school loses govt funding
text:
Sydney Islamic school loses govt funding January 5, 2017 11:49am Australian Associated Press Share 
A tribunal has upheld the federal government's decision to pull funding from Sydney's Malek Fahd Islamic school due to misuse of funds. 
The school's future was thrown into doubt in 2016 after the federal education department revoked its funding because a review found it was operating for profit. 
The Administrative Appeals Tribunal has upheld that decision, finding that while improvements have been made to how the school is run, federal funding would continue to leak to the Australian Federation of Islamic Councils.
